articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Musical Instruments to Children's Palaces
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Musical Instruments to Children's Palaces
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent musical instruments to the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace as gifts.
					 These instruments are associated with the meticulous care of Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for the future of the country and brings children's talents into full bloom as he has perfectly carried forward the noble views of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu on the younger generation.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the gifts was held in the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Hungarian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Hungarian President
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Janos Ader upon his election as president of Hungary.
					 Kim in the message wished him success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Calls on KPA to Display Militant Spirit in Construction Projects
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Calls on KPA to Display Militant Spirit in Construction Projects
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, on May 4 learned about the embankment project on Rungra Islet on the spot.
					 The project is a giant undertaking to protect from flood the Rungra Pleasure Ground for People whose appearance is changing with each passing day according to the far-reaching plan of the WPK.
					
					 When the project is completed, it will help add beauty to the landscape of Rungra Islet and Panwol Islet and provide the people with a centre for a safer and highly civilized cultural and emotional life.
					
					 Having received the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, the solder-builders have made great achievements in carrying out every process of the project in a matter of just 40 odd days since the ground-breaking by displaying popular heroism and matchless devotion.
					
					 Going round different sections of the project, the director acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the construction and the operation of vehicles. He also dropped in at bedrooms of soldier-builders and kitchens to learn about their living. 
					
					 A consultative meeting took place at the work site.
					
					 It discussed the issues of stepping up the project qualitatively and simultaneously pushing forward the afforestation and greening in the area in contact with relevant units.
					
					 Concluding the meeting, Choe called upon all the commanding officers to take good care of the living of soldiers as their elder brothers and sisters would do.
					
					 On the same day Choe also visited the construction site of the Pyongyang Folk Park to learn about the construction project and the outer network project there.
					
					 Underlining the need to complete the construction at the highest level as it is a project personally initiated by leader Kim Jong Il and for which the dear respected Kim Jong Un has shown so much concern, the director discussed measures to satisfactorily settle the matters arising in the project.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Egypt
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Egypt
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK led by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun left here Saturday to take part in the ministerial meeting of non-aligned countries due in Egypt.

articles.title: Lao and Japanese Delegations Leave for Home
articles.content:
Lao and Japanese Delegations Leave for Home
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lao National Assembly headed by its President Pany Yathortou, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, flew back Saturday. 
					 The delegation of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net headed by Director Michihiro Sasaki also went back home.

articles.title: DPRK Taekwon-Do Players Prove Successful at International Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Taekwon-Do Players Prove Successful at International Championships
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Taekwon-Doists proved successful at the 6th Asian Taekwon-Do Championships.
					The championships held in Tajikistan from April 27 to 29 brought together excellent players from 18 countries and regions including the DPRK.
					
					DPRK players bagged 22 gold medals, 7 silver ones and 7 bronze ones by fully demonstrating high technique.
					
					They placed first in the team standing.
					
					They took the first place in the senior women's team standing, in men and women's team pattern competitions, in the women's team sparring match, in the women's team special technique competition and in the women's team demonstration competition.
					
					The following are the DPRK players who won the titles:
					
					- the senior men's pattern individual C class and the sparring match in over 85kg category: Ri Hyon 
					
					- the men's pattern individual D class and the sparring match in the 57kg category: Ri Hang Song and Kim Ryong Hae
					
					- the women's pattern individual B class and the sparring match in the 63kg category: Choe Un Mi
					
					- the women's pattern individual C class and the sparring match in the 57kg category: Ri Hyang Mi 
					
					- the women's individual special technique match and the sparring match in 45kg category: Hwang Hyang Mi
					
					- the women's individual sparring matches in 51 and 75 and in over 75kg categories: Yu Jong, O Kum Ju, Choe Su Ryon.
					
					- the juvenile women's B class pattern individual, the sparring match in the 46kg category and the special technique match: Ri Un Jong 
					
					- the men's B class pattern individual: Kim Chol Hak.
					
					Ri Hyon, Ri Hyang Mi and Ri Un Jong won the top technical prize.
					
					They flew back on May 5.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Review of Economic Work in Hamhung City
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Review of Economic Work in Hamhung City
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, learned about the economic work in Hamhung City on Friday.
					 He looked round the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Ryongsong Machine Complex, the Hungnam Pharmaceutical Factory and renovated Sinhung Restaurant associated with footprints of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Workers in Hamhung City are bringing about a great surge in the drive to build an economic power, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the production at the complexes and factory and convened consultative meetings.
					
					 The meetings discussed the issues of increasing and stepping up the production of carbide and vinalon as well as fertilizers.
					
					 The meetings also took measures for pushing ahead with the production of custom-built equipment including high-performance compressor needed for various fields of national economy, increasing the production of medicines and finishing the renovation project at an early date.
					
					 Then, he went round Sinhung Restaurant.
					
					 He called on the employees of the Restaurant to perform their mission and role as servants for people, true to the Party's slogan "We Serve the People!"

articles.title: Officials, Teachers, Researchers and Students Visit KPA Exhibition of Arms and Equipment
articles.content:
Officials, Teachers, Researchers and Students Visit KPA Exhibition of Arms and Equipment
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Officials in the field of preservation of revolutionary relics and teachers, researchers and students of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry and other universities in the city visited the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army on Friday and Saturday. 
					 Being briefed on the successful building of the exhibition under the energetic guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the visitors looked round the displayed arms and equipment ranging from small arms to various types of artillery pieces, tanks, armored vehicles, warships, aircraft and strategic rockets produced at munitions factories of the DPRK.

articles.title: 15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to Open
articles.content:
15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to Open
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The 15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair will take place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from May 14 to 17.
					 It will bring together more than 270 companies from the DPRK, Netherlands, Germany, Malaysia, Mongolia, Bulgaria, Switzerland, Britain, Australia, Austria, Italy, Ethiopia, China, Finland, Poland and Taipei of China.
					
					 To be presented to the fair will be more than 2 100 kinds of products including CNC machine tools, metal, machine, electric and electronic, chemical and agricultural products, and light industrial goods, foodstuff, building materials, vehicles and medicines.

articles.title: Association for Restoration of Fatherland
articles.content:
Association for Restoration of Fatherland
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- May 5 marks the foundation day of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF).
					 The ARF, the first anti-Japanese national united front in Korea, was an underground revolutionary organization, represented by patriotic-minded people of broad strata.
					
					 In the mid-1930s, the prevailing situation urgently called for launching the movement for forming the anti-Japanese national united front at a new stage.
					
					 To cope with it, President Kim Il Sung convened a meeting in Nanhutou to advance a policy on organizing a standing body for forming the united front across the country.
					
					 Under the difficult conditions riddled with arduous marches and battles, he personally worked out the programme, rules and inaugural declaration of the association.
					
					 He declared the foundation of the ARF in Donggang meeting on May 5, Juche 25 (1936). 
					
					 Its foundation paved a way to invigorate the united front movement on a nationwide scale in keeping with the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 It also served as a basis for closely rallying all patriotic-minded people around Kim Il Sung to provide a driving force in liberating Korea from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 The Association developed in a short period to be a pan-national organization involving hundreds of thousands of people across Korea and in northeast China and Japan, making a big contribution to attaining national liberation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Rotten to Its Core: KCNA
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Rotten to Its Core: KCNA
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak is the boss of the regime made up of scandal-ridden heavyweights, which has run the whole gamut of evils.
					 Lee talked a great deal about "clear politics" and "building of honest society" but patronized and stirred up irregularities and corruption by shameless methods.
					
					 After his seizure of power as many as 20 persons among Lee's confidants and relatives and those close to him by marriage were involved in hideous scandals. This clearly indicates the disposition of rat-like Lee group gnawing and stealing everything.
					
					 The south Koreans are stunned by the scams committed by the traitor's family, backed by his power. They include the bribery scandal in which his wife's elder sister was involved, his elder brother's abuse of power, slush fund accumulation by his relative by marriage, stock price speculation by his son-in-law. There are too many scandals perpetrated by his confidants. To cite just a few, cases of enveloped money received by the ex-speaker of the "National Assembly" and the former chief secretary for political affairs of Chongwadae, the former vice-minister of Culture, Sports, and Tourism's receipt of money and articles worth a hundred million won, bribery scandal of the former manager of the Seoul City Railway Company and the former vice-minister of Knowledge and Economy's receipt of a stupendous amount of money.
					
					 The scam of Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee, another confidant of Lee, was disclosed recently. Choe confessed that he used a huge sum of money he received from a construction company in return for giving license for developing Ryangjae-dong, Seoul as an expense for an opinion poll during the 2007 "presidential election."
					
					 It is not hard to guess the wretched plight of rat-like Lee as Choe was charged with an alarming scandal after riding roughshod as a boss of south Korean media, backed by Lee.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is no better than a disgusting group of rats doing all kinds of mischief as they hurt the system of the fellow countrymen and the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and created an extreme danger of war while running the whole gamut of scams inside south Korea.
					
					 It is quite natural for such hateful traitors to be cursed, rebuffed and denounced not only by the Korean people but by the conservative group of south Korea.
					
					 In face of the continued disclosure of scandals of the Lee regime on the brink of ruin, it is finding harder to prolong its remaining days.
					
					 The rat-like Lee regime began decaying hour by hour as its corruption started from its boss.
					
					 The whole territory of Korea will be clean only when the rat-like group rotten to the core is eliminated as early as possible.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Lee Myung Bak's Bombast
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Lee Myung Bak's Bombast
  Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak was recently reported to have cried out for "strongly reacting to any provocation, not tolerating it", talking about "provocation from the north" while wining and dining with riff-raffs at Chongwadae.
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lee's talk about "the north's provocation" goes to prove that he is a psychopath and an idiot without an equal in the world.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that by crying out for "strongly reacting to provocation from the north" rat-like Lee disclosed his intention to steadily strain the situation, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 This is one more deliberate provocation getting on the nerves of the DPRK. All its service personnel and people are all out to wage a just sacred war to wipe out the rat-like Lee group to the last one as it perpetrated such treason as shaking its fist towards the Heaven. In this regard opposition parties and civic organizations in south Korea are condemning the group for having deteriorated the inter-Korean relations and created a war danger and demanding it roll back its wrong "policy toward the north." These voices are also heard from the "Saenuri Party." 
					
					 Great irony is that Lee, tight-cornered internally and externally and badly beaten, is trumpeting about "strong reaction."
					
					 In a word, the rat-like Lee group has gone so mad with confrontation with fellow countrymen that it is busy squeaking, unable to judge what tragedy is befalling it.
					
					 Its reckless provocations are only precipitating its doomsday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Bellicose Outbursts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Bellicose Outbursts
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A few days ago traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea let loose bellicose outbursts that "he would strongly react to any provocation of the north," bluffing that south Korea has "a powerful weapon". That day he talked nonsense that south Korea should pursue a peaceful race with the north, not an arms race, creating impression that it does not stand for confrontation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 What the traitor uttered is nothing but a shriek made by those who are taken aback by the DPRK's will to resolutely wipe out the hateful group of traitors to the nation.
					
					 The Lee group is the arch criminal who brought the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse, creating a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula. The group, however, is shifting the responsibility for this grave situation onto the DPRK. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by Lee in kicking off confrontation and war hysteria again. It is aimed to boost the morale of his yes men seized with uneasiness and horror and label the DPRK a provocateur in a bid to justify his group's crimes and stick to his policy of confrontation.
					
					 The above-said behaviors of Lee and his clan clearly indicate who is to blame for escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and creating the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army had already clarified its firm stand that it would wipe out the Lee group of traitors to the last man as they are desperately working to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and start of a war of aggression, while hurting even the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 As the KPA had already declared, it will blow up the Lee group of traitors and its bases for smear campaigns through a sacred war of its own style.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's "Human Rights" Racket Would Be Bound to Misfire: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's "Human Rights" Racket Would Be Bound to Misfire: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- "Human rights" campaign recently kicked off by the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea reveals its wicked design to inject fresh vitality into the ineffective anti-DPRK confrontation moves.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The puppet regime regards "human rights" campaign and nuclear racket as an important means for doing harm to the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean conservative group has malignantly slandered the dignified social system of the DPRK, escalating anti-DPRK "human rights" racket for the past four years.
					
					 The Lee group's desperate anti-DPRK "human rights" racket would be bound to misfire.
					
					 The campaign being staged in an extremely grave phase indicates the imminent ruin of the group of traitors as it is a death symptom.
					
					 The group's vicious showdown with the DPRK has drawn bitter censure and derision by people at home and abroad, driving the group into a tight corner. The Lee Myung Bak regime's failed "policy toward the north" and total bankruptcy in politics, military affair, economy and diplomacy have plunged it into the danger of collapse.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Accused of Being Utterly Indifferent to People's Lives
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Accused of Being Utterly Indifferent to People's Lives
  Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean KBS on May 2 accused south Korean puppet policemen of being utterly indifferent to people's lives.
					 According to KBS, a woman whose life was threatened informed police of the threat over phone but they failed to respond to it in time.  Finally she was abducted and killed by a criminal.
					
					 This time police was informed by a man that his wife appeared to be abducted, but they failed to properly respond to the call again, causing a murder to take place, KBS added. 
					
					 Recalling that such type policemen are apt to take bribes, the broadcasting service said more than ten policemen were punished on charges of informing a gay quarters owner of police actions in advance and receiving money in return for providing information.
					
					 People are horror-stricken, uneasy about public security, it noted.

articles.title: DPRK's Capability for Self-defence Praised by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK's Capability for Self-defence Praised by Korean in U.S.
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. Minjok Thongsin on May 1 posted an article contributed by Jong Ki Song, vice-chairman of the Eastern Regional Association of Koreans in America who took part in the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 I visited Pyongyang to confirm what position the DPRK founded by the President holds in the world history of politics in which only the theory of strength reigns, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Watching the military parade, I could understand what was the source of strength that enabled the north to firmly maintain its stand in the protracted showdown with superpower U.S. without any concession. 
					
					 The speech made by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un was aired for the first time amid tension and silence as if time had stopped advancing.
					
					 His speech was a declaration of his will to achieve final victory of the Korean revolution along the road of independence, the road of Songun without fail.
					
					 I can confidently say that the moment offered me an opportunity to wipe out the world's apprehension about the north and convinced me of the day a thriving nation will unfold in the north.
					
					 The military parade featured by the marching style peculiar to the Korean People's Army greatly excited spectators. 
					
					 That day my excitement did not subside due to expectation, hope and conviction of new political order in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and equilibrium of strength.
					
					 Viewers of the military parade said the moment dropped a curtain on military and technical edge which has been considered by the imperialists as a monopoly. 
					
					 In the north all the service personnel and people rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea are like a family whose members help and love each other.
					
					 As mentioned above, all people in the north are leading a harmonious life in a big family in their own way of thinking and lifestyle. It is ridiculous to speak ill of these people over "human rights issue", "heredity" and "seclusion."
					
					 The loud shouts of "Hurrah!" that shook the square was enough to prove that the attempts of those letting loose deliberate and malignant invectives against the north to do harm to the DPRK are futile.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Brazilian Organization's Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Brazilian Organization's Website
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted the full text of the talk the dear respected Kim Jong Un had with leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on April 6, 2012 "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" on its internet website on April 25.
					 The work says that it is the principled requirement for victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Expounded in the work is the task to constantly develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Speech of Kim Jong Un Carried in Bulletin by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Speech of Kim Jong Un Carried in Bulletin by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association on April 27 carried in its bulletin the full text of the speech the dear respected Kim Jong Un made at the military parade celebrating the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung on April 15.
					 In the speech he said that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation proved the truth that the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation hinge on an outstanding leader.
					
					 Expounded in the speech was the idea that the ever victorious history of the Korean People's Army guaranteed the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and that it will provide a sure guarantee for the eternity of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 The speech set forth tasks for demonstrating the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 The bulletin carried a photo of smiling President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Reported by Foreign Media, Regional Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Reported by Foreign Media, Regional Organization
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign media and a regional organization reported between April 19 and 25 about the tough stand of the army and people of the DPRK who declared their will to take thousand-fold revenge on the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen after hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation.
					 The Bangladeshi paper Blits carried the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry under the title "If anything happens in the Korean Peninsula, traitor Lee Myung Bak is to blame".
					
					 The Kuwaiti paper Arab Times said the DPRK condemned Lee's recent months of desperate act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and declared a sacred war.
					
					 The DPRK declared its stand that the targets of strike are herds of rats including the Lee group of traitors and conservative media which mislead the fair public opinion and that the special action will last three or four minutes by a peculiar means and Korean-style modes, the paper noted.
					
					 Three Cambodian papers,  the Indian papers Hindustan Times and Kirishna Aberta, a Mongolian paper, the Maltese paper Malta Times, Radio Broadcasting of Ethiopia, internet websites of China and the Internet website of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Region reported the full text or gist of the April 18 statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, the April 19 statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK, the April 22 statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the April 23 notice of the special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the KPA.

articles.title: Victories Are in Store for DPRK: Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Victories Are in Store for DPRK: Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Papers of Indonesia and Vietnam carried articles to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The Indonesian paper The First Times on April 25 carried an article titled "Guards division and Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un".
					
					 It introduced the glorious history of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA and deep attention paid by leader Kim Jong Il to the division for its development.
					
					 KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un inspected the division on New Year's day, a solemn declaration of his will to carry forward the Songun cause of Kim Jong Il to the letter, the paper pointed out.
					
					 He was another President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in his activities that day, the paper noted, adding the DPRK would always achieve victory by demonstrating the might of Songun.
					
					 The April 23rd issue of the Vietnamese paper Quan Doi Nhan Dan said the KPA's might lies in its politico-ideological might, powerful military strength, high technique and great army-people unity.
					
					 The fundamental factor of the KPA's might is the leadership provided by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un as they founded and bolstered the army.

articles.title: Parte delegacion de RPDC para reunion ministerial de NOAL
articles.content:
Parte delegacion de RPDC para reunion ministerial de NOAL
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Pak Ui Chun partio el dia 5 de esta capital para participar en la reunion ministerial de los Paises No Alineados que tendra lugar en Egipto.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim averigua labor economica de ciudad de Hamhung
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim averigua labor economica de ciudad de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo el dia 4 en el terreno la labor economica de la ciudad de Hamhung.
					Choe recorrio el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong, la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Hungnam y el reconstruido Restaurante Sinhung, donde estan impregnadas las huellas de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los obreros de la ciudad de Hamhung hacen innovaciones en construir la potencia economica en acato al legado del Dirigente.
					
					Primeramente, recorriendo varios puntos del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam, el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong y la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Hungnam, analizo el estado productivo y organizo las reuniones consultivas.
					
					En las ocasiones se discutieron los temas de incrementar la produccion del carburo de calcio y de vinalon, y acelerar la produccion de abonos quimicos necesarios a la agricultura.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para promover con mas vigor la produccion de equipos pedidos necesarios a varios dominios de la economia nacional, incluyendo la produccion del represor de alta capacidad, incrementar la produccion de medicinas y terminar cuanto antes la reconstruccion.
					
					Seguidamente, Choe estuvo en el Restaurante Sinhung.
					
					Transmitiendo la leyenda de amor de los grandes hombres sin pares por el pueblo, el restaurante se contribuye a hacer mas rico la vida alimentaria de los moradores de la ciudad de Hamhung.
					
					Recorriendo el restaurante, Choe destaco la necesidad de cumplir la mision y deber como servidor del pueblo levantando en alto la consigna del partido "!Servir al pueblo!"

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre el campo de construccion de malecon en Rungna
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre el campo de construccion de malecon en Rungna
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo el dia 4 en el terreno como marcha la construccion del malecon en el islote Rungna.
					Esta obra se propone proteger desde las inundaciones el Parque de Diversiones del Pueblo de Rungna en plena construccion segun el magno proyecto del Partido.
					
					Cuando termine la obra, los islotes Rungna y Panwol se tornaran mas hermosos y se creara un centro de descanso cultural mas seguro.
					
					Segun la orden del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, los constructores militares alcanzaron muchos exitos en mas de 40 dias desde el inicio de la obra trabajando con el heroismo masivo e incomparable abnegacion.
					
					En su recorrido por varias partes del campo de construccion, Choe hizo conocimiento detallado del avance de construccion y del estado de operacion de los medios de transporte y averiguo las condiciones de vida de los constructores militares en el dormitorio y la cocina.
					
					Se ha convocado una reunion de consulta que debatio una serie de asuntos como acelerar la obra con calidad e impulsar simultaneamente la reforestacion del contorno en relacion con las unidades correspondientes.
					
					Al concluir la reunion, Choe dijo que todos los oficiales deben atender la vida de los uniformados como sus hermanos mayores.
					
					El mismo dia, el recorrio el campo de construccion del Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang informandose de los detalles de la obra arquitectonica y construccion de instalaciones exteriores.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il tomo la iniciativa de esta obra y el Comandante Supremo presta mucha atencion a ella, senalo y prosiguio que se debe terminarla en el maximo nivel.  
					
					Por ultimo, consulto los remedios para solucionar satisfactoriamente los problemas surgidos.

articles.title: Se montara en Pyongyang exposicion internacional de mercancias
articles.content:
Se montara en Pyongyang exposicion internacional de mercancias
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar del 14 al 17 del mes en curso en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la XV Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang.
					Tomaran parte en la ocasion mas de 270 companias de Corea, Holanda, Alemania, Malasia, Mongolia, Bulgaria, Suiza, Gran Bretana, Australia, Austria, Italia, Etiopia, China, Finlandia, Polonia y Taipei de China.
					
					Se exhibiran las mercancias de mas de 2 mil 100 variedades de varios dominios tales como las maquinas herramientas CNC, metalurgia, maquinaria, electricidad, electronica, quimica, agricultura, industria ligera, alimentos y articulos de uso diario, materiales de construccion, transporte y medicina.

articles.title: ACNC califica de corrupto al "gobierno" surcoreano
articles.content:
ACNC califica de corrupto al "gobierno" surcoreano
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- El traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak designo a los acostumbrados a la corrupcion en los cargos del poder y amparo de modo cinico los casos ilicitos de toda indole hablando de la "politica limpia" y la "construccion de una sociedad honrada". 
					Durante el mandato de Lee, mas de 20 ayudantes del poder y parentescos politicos del traidor Lee cometieron la irregularidad y corrupcion de gran tamano, lo cual revela el temperamento de la horda ratonesca que roen y roban a sus caprichos. 
					
					Son incontables tales casos cometidos por sus parientes y  subditos. 
					
					Hace poco, se ha revelado otro caso de corrupcion de Choe Si Jung, ex presidente del Comite de Radiodifusion y Comunicacion. 
					
					Choe confeso que recibio enormes fondos de una compania de construccion al precio de conceder el permiso sobre el desarrollo del barrio Ryangjae de Seul, y los derrocho como gastos para la encuesta para las "elecciones presidenciales" en 2007. 
					
					La banda del traidor Lee es la horda de ratones que por una parte, crea el clima de guerra insultando atrevidamente el sistema y la maxima dignidad de la parte connacional, y por la otra, comete los casos ilicitos de toda indole.
					
					Por esta razon, los traidores fueron denunciados, repudiados y rechazados por el pueblo coreano y hasta por la banda conservadora surcoreana. 
					
					Ahora, el "gobierno" de Lee se encuentra en la situacion muy dificil de mantener su vida restante. 
					
					Hay que eliminar cuanto antes a los ratones que empiezan a podrirse desde la cabeza.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia chismografia de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia chismografia de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, el traidor Lee Myung Bak ofrecio una orgia en Chongwadae y mientras comia con unos fulanos y menganos invitados, dijo con fanfarroneria que "cualquier provocacion del Norte (de Corea) tropezara con fuerte reaccion". 
					Al respecto, el diario Minju Joson publico este sabado un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					El ratoncito Lee Myung Bak, que habla obstinadamente de la "provocacion del Norte", es psicopata e idiota numero 1 del mundo.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que el expuso su intencion de seguir empeorando la situacion exclamando la "fuerte reaccion" bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "provocacion del Norte".
					
					Esto es otra provocacion malintencionada que ofende a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Ahora, todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea se incorporan a la sagrada guerra de justicia por aniquilar a la banda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak que cometio el tremendo crimen de traicion.
					
					Ante tal situacion, los partidos opositores y las entidades civiles del Sur de Corea demandan la cancelacion de la erronea "politica sobre el Norte" denunciando que la banda de Lee agravo las relaciones Norte-Sur y trajo el peligro de guerra.
					
					Esta insistencia suena tambien en el interior del "Partido Saenuri".
					
					Sin embargo, esa horda de ratones, enloquecida por el enfrentamiento fratricida, no se dio cuenta todavia del tremendo castigo que se le acerca.
					
					Con sus acciones provocativas, ella esta adelantando el dia de su muerte.
